title: Following up on an unpaid invoice
context: Politely demand that a client pay you for the work you just finished.

content.bestLine: Could you please settle the outstanding invoice?

neutral.text: When can I expect the payment?
Just a reminder about the invoice
Can you update me on the payment status?
I'm still waiting for the payment
Could you please process the payment?
I'd appreciate it if you could pay the invoice

formal.text: I would like to request payment for the completed work
Please find the invoice attached for your prompt attention
Could you please arrange for the payment to be made?
I would appreciate it if you could settle the outstanding balance
Please let me know when I can expect the payment to be made

patterns.template: I would appreciate it if you could [options] the payment

dialogs.description: Following up on an unpaid invoice

lines.speaker: Freelancer
lines.text: Hi, I wanted to follow up on the invoice I sent over last week

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: Oh, sorry about that. I'll get it processed right away

lines.speaker: Freelancer
lines.text: Could you please settle the outstanding invoice?

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: Yes, of course. I'll send it over to our accounting department
